text: Læa sahrab thuk «prachachati rea di kahnd sthan thi tha phithikrrm pheux phwk khea cak di klaw phranam khx ngxallxhˌ tx sing thi phraxngkh thrng prathan hı pen paccay yangchiph kæ phwk khea khux satw si thea (chen xuth waw phæa kæa) chanan phracea khxng phwk cea khux phracea xngkh deiyw dangnan sahrab phraxngkh theanan phwk cea cng nxbnxm læa cng cæng khawdi kæ br rda phu cngrakphakdi nxbnxm thxm tn theid
